Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=6.3 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538p (MIC=25 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermis ATCC 12228 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240 (MIC=6.3 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: De novo generation of antimicrobial LK peptides with a single tryptophan at the critical amphipathic interface.
Literature.Author: Kang SJ, Won HS, Choi WS, Lee BJ.
